welcome01: This website allows you to edit or create for Clash of Spears API, the miniatures game Clash of Spears. You will be able to create, edit or delete all of the armies available for the different expansions.
welcome02: You are more than welcome to use this website to fully enjoy this game.
webs01: If you need any add-ons to play Clash of Spears, visit Caliga
listAllChanges: Complete list of all changes
